bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to J.F. Rodriguez-Perez, December 18, 1941

div1.p: Hench requests a copy of a publication called "Memorias del Hospital No. 1."

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to J.F. Rodriguez-Perez, December 18, 1941
div1.opener:
Y F.
December 18, 1941
Dr. J. F. Rodriguez-Perez
Director de la Seccion de Publicaciones
Cientificas y Biblioteca
Instituto Finlay
Habana, Cuba
My dear Doctor Rodriguez-Perez:
div1.p:
I appreciate greatly your letter of December 5.
While the Alabama Photo Studios have the “Memoria del Hospi-
tal No. 1” would it not be possible for you to have them
make the copy that I wanted? On the other hand, if you are
sending a complete copy to the Army Medical Library in this
country, perhaps I could borrow their copy without going to
the expense of having one made myself. Would you kindly tell
me when you plan to send this to the Army Medical Library?
I expect to visit the library in January and if it is there
by that time I shall be very happy to see it.
div1.closer: Very truly yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
